bibdata.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for the Internet
Web Site Engineering, Web Site Management and Web Site Life Cycle
IEEE Recommended Practice for the Internet - Web Site Engineering, Web Site Management and Web Site Life Cycle

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Recommended practices for World Wide Web page engineering for Intranet and Extranet environments, based on World Wide Web Consortium (W3C<sup>&#x00AE;</sup>) and related industry guidelines, are defined in this recommended practice. This recommended practice does not address stylistic considerations or human-factors considerations in web page design beyond limitations that reflect good engineering practice.

Replaced by ISO/IEC 23026: 2006. Recommended practices for World Wide Web page engineering for Intranet and Extranet environments, based on World Wide Web Consortium (W3C(R) ) and related industry guidelines,are defined in this recommended practice. This recommended practice does not address stylistic considerations or human-factors considerations in web page design beyond limitations that reflect good engineering practice.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
